subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Martin Brodeur stopped 16 shots, and Zach Parise, Patrik Elias and Anssi Salmela each scored in the Devils’ 3-0 victory over the Islanders on Wednesday night in a preseason game in Uniondale, N.Y. The Devils improved to 3-2 in the preseason. MacDonald made 19 saves for the Islanders (2-2) in their only preseason game at home.
